attributes.description:
Nissan NP300: Earning It’s Keep!
Known around the world as the Nissan NP300 Pickup, but here in South Africa as the Nissan Hardbody, this legendary bakkie is reliable, durable and amazingly affordable. Now affectionately renamed the Nissan NP300 Hardbody in South Africa, this bakkie is still the same workhorse of choice for many business owners who are looking to invest in a proven business bakkie platform. All trade ins are welcomed. In house finance is available.
